amendment.description: An amendment numbered 65 printed in Part B of House Report 118-216 to reduce the salary of Jonathan Davidson, Chief of Staff of the Department of Homeland Security, to $1.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Nehls amendment (A034) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Nehls amendment (A034) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Nehls amendment (A034) Agreed to by voice vote.
